TopicTitle: I heard we could slow down time

Articles.Content:
I heard it's possible to slow down time to have better framerates.

How do you do it?

Thanks!

you are getting something confused. I'm pretty sure what you're referring to is cutting the time spent on physics calculations down so your CPU isnt working so hard and can concentrate on other stuff. if FPS is your problem though, this only helps if your CPU is the bottleneck.

The delta time slider in the settings screen can do this, by sliding it to the right to reduce the value, KSP will reduce the simulation speed instead of lagging if things become too much for the physics engine, but don't reduce it too far as if you do the physics will become less accurate
